name: Breastfeeding
title: Breastfeeding
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent active breastfeeding.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category or attribute related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with lactation and the actual finding or intention of breastfeeding or nursing.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
